metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24577 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GPAC 1.0.1 is affected by a NULL pointer dereference in gf_utf8_wcslen. (gf_utf8_wcslen is a renamed Unicode utf8_wcslen function.)

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24577` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1
gpac-modules-base - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1
libgpac11 - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg1-2build1').
